B

Bar - Class in com.vtuberrush.src.ui
A bar is a non-clickable, superclass object that is placed at the bottom of the playing field and is used to group Buttons together that perform special functions such as placing down a tile or a unit.
Bar(int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class com.vtuberrush.src.ui.Bar
Creates a new bar in the defined location.
blastEnemy(Unit, Enemy) - Method in class com.vtuberrush.src.scenes.Playing
Deals damage to the passed enemy that is near the passed unit.
Called when a Petra unit spots an enemy within range.
bounds - Variable in class com.vtuberrush.src.enemies.Enemy
Defines the hitbox or the four rectangular coordinates (x, y) of this enemy from the top and left of the window in pixels.
Button - Class in com.vtuberrush.src.ui
A button is a clickable object that interacts with the mouse listener to run certain functions when hovering and releasing the mouse.
All button objects inherit the same color, border, font, and center text alignment.
Button(String, int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class com.vtuberrush.src.ui.Button
Creates a new button at the location with the passed height, width, and renderable text.
This constructor is used for creating menu buttons.
Button(String, int, int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class com.vtuberrush.src.ui.Button
Creates a new button at the location with the passed height, width, and selected tile for editing
This constructor is used for creating level editor buttons.
